text: José Mario Ruiz Navas (20 July 1930 - 10 December 2020) was an Ecuadorian Roman Catholic prelate. Ruiz Navas was born in Pujilí, Ecuador. He became a priest in 1954. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Latacunga, Ecuador, from 1968 to 1989 and then as bishop and then archbishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Portoviejo, Ecuador, from 1989 to 2007.Archdiocese of Portoviejo Ruiz Navas died on 10 December 2020 in Latacunga, Ecuador at the age of 90.Archbishop José Mario Ruiz Navas ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Ecuadorian Roman Catholic bishops Category:Roman Catholic priests Category:Roman Catholic archbishops
title: José Mario Ruiz Navas
